top_comments.comment: We have Rao's at Costco in NC. Planning on going this weekend, so I hope it's on sale!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Hi Bobby, I've been searching for "Seeds" can you send me a link?
Rao’s Italian sauce is the only commercially produced marinara sauce that Ina Garten uses.  Need I say more. Thanks for all the nutritional and ecological information.
